page.title: 05Employment in Barrhead
page.content: The main employers in Barrhead are {Spillers Co.}which produces food for cats and dogs,{Armitage Shanks}which produces bathroom suites and{Yorkshire {Imperial Metals}which manufactures copper tubing.Other companies currently in the town include {Volvo,Gaskell Felt}and{Rockfall. In line with the rest of the country Barrhead has unfortunately an {unemployment}problem.No local employers have an expansion programme at this time and there are very few vacancies available.Over four thousand people are currently unemployed in Barrhead and the surrounding district. Next year{Fine Fare Stores}will open a new supermarket on the site of the now closed Scottish Fellmongers Skinworks in Kelburn Street.This new store should create about one hundred new jobs.
